description: works with my shareware copy of doom (which is the only copy of doom i have)
Error IWAD missing. Does not start!

Runs perfect, just like playing on DOS. Don't forget to copy your game files (WAD) to ~/.local/share/games/doom/ - if multiple WAD are here, then by default Doom II will be run.

Alternatively, start the game from a terminal using "chocolate-doom -iwad doom.wad", replacing doom.wad with the game of choice of course.
Although the initial IWad file moving was a pain, it is afte rall DOOM!
My dad and I are making a video arcade setup with a Rasberry Pie. We are DEFINETLY putting this game on it.
Error IWAD missing. Does not start!
summary: Error IWAD missing. Does not start!

description:
I installed this and it worked right away.
Wth many other doom ports for linux I experiences many bugs, glitches and often the game wouldn't start.

This one works perfectly and it's identical to the original Doom.
I'm happy :D
